name: Box Olympics
description:
Can you become the box olympics champion?

Compete in this fun packed game for the highest score in two back-to-back box olympic sports!

Dash Race:

Hit the slider when its in the red zone to increase your box's speed and dash through other enemies. Get the best time possible!

High Jump:

Gather your jump power to bounce the highest and try to get as much airtime using the dash as u can. See if you can beat your own high jump distance!

Credits : 

Sound Designer/Music Composer: @batterfingers64

Assets Used: 

Clouds: Pixel Art Semi-Realistic Clouds

Flame Animation: Free Pixel Effects

Platform and Initial Box Sprite: Misc Platformer Assets
